product_definition.core_value_proposition: The fastest, cleanest way to save, organize, and find memes with AI-powered tagging and professional-grade organization features

pain_points: Can't find specific memes when needed
Need quick access to meme templates

problem_solution_fit.core_problem: Memes get lost in camera rolls, saved across multiple apps, and become impossible to find when needed
problem_solution_fit.solution_approach: Dedicated meme library with AI-powered organization, advanced search, and subscription-tier professional features
problem_solution_fit.evidence: Users report meme libraries 'spiral out of control fast' and current solutions are either creation-focused or storage-focused, not both

mvp_features.description: Save memes from camera roll, screenshots, share sheet, or direct camera capture
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to quickly save memes from any source so I don't lose them

mvp_features.description: AI-powered auto-tagging with custom tags, folders, and collections
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want my memes automatically organized so I can find them easily

mvp_features.description: Search by tags, text in image, date, source, or custom metadata
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to quickly find specific memes using various search criteria

mvp_features.description: Share individual memes or collections with customizable quality and formats
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to easily share my favorite memes or curated collections

mvp_features.description: Add, edit, and search custom captions for memes
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to add context or notes to my memes for better organization

premium_features.justification: Primary subscription driver for power users

premium_features.description: Advanced AI recognition for automatic content-based tagging
OCR text search, similarity search, and complex filter combinations
Unlimited folders, collections, and custom metadata fields
Original quality preservation and bulk export options
Cross-device sync and automatic backup to cloud storage

excluded_features.reason: Out of scope for MVP - focus on library/organization, not creation
Avoid complexity of user-generated content and social networking

storage_requirements.cloud_storage: Integration with RevenueCat for subscription management

ai_integration.image_recognition: On-device ML for basic tagging, cloud ML for advanced features

business_model.monetization_strategy: Freemium with clear upgrade path through storage and AI feature limitations

user_engagement: Memes saved per user per week (target: 10+)
